cheer big T, so the silver ingots are at11 oclock and 4 oclock ?, at 2 
and 8 oclocks  the birds with leaves on either side ?, there are 4 birds 
seperating everything and the 1/4 cirlces are damboo ?, I was told they 
may be a bobbin ?.

limmerick away ol' bean :-)

Rich
